field.value: MonoRail.ActiveRecordScaffold - Could not save ***(ClassName). Unexpected row count: 0; expected: 1

field.name: description
field.value: I'm learning AcriveRecord/MonoRails. I have a smiple class Category. When using Scaffolding, I create a Category, everything OK. But when I edit it, there comes a message says "Could not save Category. Unexpected row count: 0; expected: 1". And I noticed before I click "Save Changes", in the html, it's :<input type="hidden" id="Category_Id" name="Category.Id" value="1" />; after clicking, it becomes: <input type="hidden" id="Category_Id" name="Category.Id" value="0" />.
